description: Stores student enrollment records including enrollment dates, status, and enrollment type across academic terms.
businessMeaning: Core enrollment information for each student used by attendance, scheduling, and district/state reporting. Supports incremental changes when students enroll, withdraw, or change status.
content: Synergy Student Enrollment table. Stores student enrollment records including dates, status, and type. Business usage includes attendance roll-ups, scheduling eligibility, and compliance reporting. Domain: Student Information. Source: STU_ENROLLMENT.

description: Primary reported ethnicity of the student as captured in Synergy.
businessMeaning: Used for equity reporting, subgroup analysis, and compliance. Values align to district-adopted codes and may map to CEDS definitions.
content: Student demographics column Ethnicity. Captures the student's primary reported ethnicity for compliance and equity analysis. Domain: Student Information. Data type: VARCHAR(50). Source table: STU_DEMOGRAPHICS. CEDS reference: https://ceds.ed.gov/element/001234.

description: Aggregated daily attendance facts derived from classroom period-level submissions.
businessMeaning: Supports dashboards and interventions with daily present/absent counts per student and campus. Used by principals and counselors to monitor attendance trends.
content: Daily Attendance dataset aggregated from period-level attendance entries. Provides per-student, per-campus present/absent indicators for dashboards and interventions. Domain: Attendance. Lineage: synergy.attendance.period.element.

businessMeaning: Indicates the primary language spoken by the student at home. Used for EL identification and services planning.
content: Student Primary Language element used for English Learner services planning and compliance. Domain: Student Information. May map to CEDS language elements.

description: Defines course sections including term, period, room, teacher, and capacity.
businessMeaning: Backbone of scheduling operations. Used to place students, allocate staff time, and manage classroom resources.
content: Course Section table with term, period, room, teacher assignments, and capacity settings. Supports student placement and staff allocation. Domain: Scheduling.

description: Current enrollment status code for the student (e.g., Active, Withdrawn, Graduated).
businessMeaning: Ambiguous label 'Status' clarified: represents enrollment status driving eligibility for services and funding.
content: Enrollment Status column indicating Active/Withdrawn/Graduated codes that control service eligibility and funding logic. Domain: Student Information. Data type: VARCHAR(20). Source: STU_ENROLLMENT.

description: Flag indicating whether a student has a Section 504 accommodation plan.
businessMeaning: Supports compliance and service planning; used by counselors and special programs to ensure appropriate supports.
content: 504 Indicator element signaling the presence of a Section 504 plan. Used for compliance tracking and service planning. Domain: Student Services.

description: Student-level assessment scores and performance levels across standardized tests.
businessMeaning: Used by campus leadership and teachers to analyze performance, identify gaps, and inform instruction.
content: Assessment Results dataset with student scores and performance levels from standardized assessments. Enables gap analysis and instructional planning. Domain: Assessment.
